harp-platform.title: Harp Platform
harp-platform.description: Our front-end publishing platform integrated with Dropbox. Built-in preprocessing, Clean <abbr>URLs</abbr>, Custom Domains and <abbr>SSL</abbr> for every application.

harp.title: Harp
harp.tagline: Harp, the static web server with built-in preprocessing
harp.description: Harp, the static web server with built-in preprocessing, makes Markdown, <abbr>LESS</abbr>, CoffeeScript, and more, as easy to use as <abbr>HTML</abbr>, <abbr>CSS</abbr>, and JavaScript.

webty_pe-journal.title: webty.pe: A Journal of Typography & the Screen
webty_pe-journal.tagline: Extending the history of web typography
webty_pe-journal.description: webty.pe is a publication about print and screen typography, together. We presented it as a digital publication and a printed magazine.

awkward-stage-productions.title: Awkward Stage Productions
awkward-stage-productions.description: Awkward Stage Productions is a non-profit theatre company. Its organisers create oppertunities for youth interested in theatre performance and production, helping them to move from education to employment.
